page.title: 19Ufton Diary - June 1985.
page.content: The following events were noted from the Ufton Village Diary which is publishd each month in the village. Sun 2nd. Holy Communion 9.a.m. Evening Prayer 4.p.m. Mon 3rd. Parish Council Meeting Tues4th. Over 60's Club Vill.Hall W.I. Comm. Meeting Wed 5th. Bible Study Group Thur6th. Play Bus Mothers Union Meeting Fri.7th. Whist Drive Vill. Hall Sat.8th. BINGO!! Vill. Hall Sun.9th. Family Service + Holy Comm. 11.15.a.m. Mon.10th.County Library Van visit. Amenities Comm. Meeting. Tue.11th.M.U.Deanery outing to Lincoln. Many of these events are weekly.
